Opensource

At Invana, we strongly believe that Innovation needs openness and Collaborations from different directions. So we always try to develop as much tech as possible in opensource!

Web Crawler Plus

A micro-framework to crawl the web pages with crawlers configs. It can use MongoDB, Elasticsearch and Solr databases to cache and save the extracted data.
